metadata.name: [curious] I noticed the lab change too, and h

snippets.text: [concerned] So you’re thinking this might be cardiac instead of infectious? That would line up with the fluid signs and explain the oxygen fluctuation.
[relieved] That actually makes a lot of sense given his history. I’ll get the diuretics ready and set up close monitoring so we can see how he responds quickly.
[curious] I noticed the lab change too, and his oxygen saturation dipped overnight before coming back up. It wasn’t dramatic, but it didn’t look like a monitor error either.
[steady] [reassuring] You’re doing fine, we’re just double-checking everything and making sure we don’t miss anything. We’ll stay right here with you while the doctor checks the records.
